amendment.description: An amendment numbered 154 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds to implement or enforce recommendation of the Naming Commission in regards to the Reconciliation Monument in Arlington National Cemetery.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
